query:
UPDATE companies SET 
  logo = 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/d/d8/Nestl%C3%A9.svg/200px-Nestl%C3%A9.svg.png',
  primaryColor = '#D71920',
  secondaryColor = '#FFFFFF'
WHERE id = 'nestle_brasil';

UPDATE companies SET 
  logo = 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5e/Unilever.svg/200px-Unilever.svg.png',
  primaryColor = '#0078D4',
  secondaryColor = '#00A3E0'
WHERE id = 'unilever_brasil';

UPDATE companies SET 
  logo = 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6f/BRF_S.A._logo.svg/200px-BRF_S.A._logo.svg.png',
  primaryColor = '#006838',
  secondaryColor = '#FFD100'
WHERE id = 'brf_brasil';
command:
